Pre-Game Insights: Both Belarus and Bulgaria seem a little too focused on not losing than actually chasing a win, and as such, the draw is a tasty value bet from our perspective.
Miscellaneous Highlights: In 10 of the last 12 Belarus matches in the UEFA Nations League C, the sum of goals was under 3.5
In 15 of the last 17 Bulgaria matches the sum of goals was under 3.5
Belarus vs Bulgaria Results: Both teams found the back of the net four times in the past eight matches between home side Belarus and Bulgaria.
Others: Dmitri Antilevski has found the back of the net one times in his previous six games for Belarus; who will surely not mind him striking again on Thursday.
Punters will also be looking for Kiril Despodov to keep up his current streak for Bulgaria, having scored four in his last six games for his national team.
